attributes.action: include spiritualist religion as one of the religions taught in our schools as part of the curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British schools currently teach about various religions, but spiritualist is not one of them. As this is a religion that has gone through parliament, (one of only two) we feel this should be part of the curriculum, showing mutual respect,understanding and shared values.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "include spiritualist religion as one of the religions taught in our schools as part of the curriculum."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21275
